General.Name: Sanginita Chemicals Limited
General.Description: Sanginita Chemicals Limited manufactures and exports cuprous chloride, cupric chloride, and copper sulphate in India. The company also offers copper phthalocyanine blue crude. Its products are used in dyes and pigment industries, paint industries, pharmaceuticals industries, electroplating industries, metal extraction industries and ink, carbon paper, PVC pipe coating industries, etc. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Gandhinagar, India.
